description: Add support for Amazon VPC peering
Add support for the latest Amazon Redshift API
Add support for the latest Amazon CloudSearch API
Fix issue when list arguments were not being decoded to unicode properly (`issue 711 <https://github.com/aws/aws-cli/issues/711>`__)
Fix issue when invalid output type was provided in a config file or environment variable (`issue 600 <https://github.com/aws/aws-cli/issues/600>`__)
